cast.overview: In a struggling post-Soviet community, Lilya a teenage girl is abandoned when her mother moves to the United States with her boyfriend. Facing neglect and poverty, she meets Andrei, who offers her a job in Sweden, giving her hope for a better life — and a journey that will change everything.
cast.title: Lilya 4-ever

details.biography: Nikolai Bentsler (born July 7, 1984 in Tallinn) is an Estonian actress. He graduated from the Moscow Art Theater Studio School in 2006. He has played mainly in the Russian Theater, but also in several films and TV series. Most notably Lilja 4-ever in which he played Natasha's Boyfriend.
details.name: Nikolai Bentsler
details.place_of_birth: Tallinn, Harju County, Estonian SSR, USSR [now Estonia]
